class code_General.connections.s3.ManageS3(aesKey, location, bucketName, endpoint, key, secret, local: bool)¶

Class for managing access to local/remote AWS

__getattr__(item)¶
createBucket(bucketName)¶

Create a named bucket to put stuff in. Should only be used freely for localstack!

Parameters:

bucketName (Str) – Name of the bucket

Returns:

Success or error

Return type:

Bool or Error

uploadFile(fileKey, file)¶

Upload a binary in-memory file to storage.

Parameters:

  • fileKey (Str) – The key with which to retrieve the file again later

  • file (BytesIO InMemoryFile) – InMemory BytesIO object containing a file

Returns:

Success or error

Return type:

Bool or Error

downloadFile(fileKey)¶

Upload a binary in-memory file to storage.

Parameters:

fileKey (Str) – The key with which to retrieve the file again later

Returns:

File or error

Return type:

BytesIO or Error

deleteFile(fileKey)¶

Delete a file from storage.

Parameters:

fileKey (Str) – The key with which to retrieve the file again later

Returns:

File or error

Return type:

BytesIO or Error
